intro: Plan your moves and build your army in this monster card game
description:
Monsters in Cards is a turn-based strategy game where each card represents a monster with a specific type of attack. Plan your moves carefully, choose the perfect moment to strike, and defeat your opponents in tactical battles that test your strategy and control.

Throughout the campaign, you’ll be able to acquire new monster cards from the shop by earning coins and prestige — rewards gained through battles and victories. Each new monster you unlock brings fresh tactical possibilities, allowing you to assemble the perfect army to take on increasingly challenging enemies.
